commit.message:
Rollup merge of #102742 - bjorn3:cleanup_rust_start_panic, r=ChrisDenton

Remove unnecessary raw pointer in __rust_start_panic arg

It is no longer necessary as __rust_start_panic switched to the Rust abi.
